channel.title: Todo on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Todo on Deuts Log

item.title: Update on Vikunja
item.description: This post discusses a recent change in the Docker installation of Vikunja, where a separate API container is no longer required. The author is considering starting to use Vikunja and plans to adapt the provided Docker Compose file (originally using Traefik) to their own setup with NPM as the reverse proxy.

item.title: I can't make Vikunja work on my set up
item.description: Vikunja is a feature-rich open-source todo app, but installing it via Docker requires multiple containers. The author faced frequent Internal Server Errors and API issues when using docker-compose, even after adding Redis. Frustrated by the ongoing errors, the author ultimately removed the setup entirely.
